Reviews.Author: Attap "Attap"
Reviews.Content: AllJust to balance the rave reviews out there. Are some of them not written by Canon employers I wonder!I bought this camera based on the rave reviews about a year ago. I wanted something compact but which offered a fast processing speed. Even back then people were warning of the flash issue etc.I - like many others who have written reviews - was happy with it during the "honeymoon period".After exactly a year it just stopped working. Lense is stuck in the half way posn. It has not suffered any knocks etc. I was just downloading pics and it went US. Warranty only for a year.So DONT BE SUCKERED IN BY THE RAVE REVIEWS which have no doubt been written by people who have only had the camera for a short period of time. Read the reviews who are not impressed with the camera and they all have the same issue: CAMERA LENSE AND LACK OF AFTER SALES SERVICE. You have been warned! Its a too high tech for its own good! Save your money and go for something more reliable!

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: HELENA WEGLOWSKI "HELINX"
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT THIS CAMERA ON A CHANCE. I LOVE IT. TAKES GREAT PIX, ESPECIALLY GREAT FOR DARK SETTINGS AS CAMERA ADJUSTS AUTOMATICALLY WHEN SET ON AUTO MODE. GREAT PRICE FOR THE QUALITY OF PIX TAKEN.

Reviews.Title: Overall Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Alan Hardin
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to replace my 5 year old digital elph 5 megapixel.  I bought this model for three reasons:1. Because it's a Canon.2. Because it has a 3 inch viewing screen (I don't know why Canon doesn't include this on all models).3. The 12 x optical zoom.Overall this is a really great camera with lots of functions and takes high quality pictures.  Not quite small enough to fit in your pocket but still a decent size given its functions.My only complaint (and it's a minor one) is the pop-up flash.  I don't know why Canon could not have put in a built in flash.  It is annoying to have the flash up even when you don't need it.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: David Belleville
Reviews.Content: Personally, I'm not really impressed with the camera.  Canon can do much better, especially for the price.Besides all the other issues:The photos have heavy noise filtering and then sharpening.It seems to have trouble consistently focusing.The photos are a bit under-saturated even in bright daylight.Here are about a thousand photos my kid took with it:[...]

Reviews.Title: a mini slr & hd camcoder pack
Reviews.Author: V. Chandrasekaran "Venky"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera few days before.I know the lens is locked when shooting HD, but normally your subject is at a constant distance so zooming in beffore taking video is not a big inconvenience. This machine is a killer in its manual control.The camera body is not that great, i has some thing to improve, but given its might i dont care about the body. After all im buying camera for its picture and Video.A good hibrid camera, im not going to buy a dedicated videocamera for videos.Many compare it with Lumix Z3 , but come on this guy is s mini slr.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as the reviews
Reviews.Author: K. Kosiak "Vergasguitar"
Reviews.Content: We liked the zoom, but were pretty unimpressed with the picture quality. We are trying to upgrade from a 3.1 megapixel Kodak and honestly, we really couldn't see much better picture clarity with the canon. You'd think that jumping up 4X in MP we'd see a remarkable difference. We didn't.We liked the camera, software is easy to install and use, and the zoom was nice, but too much money for the quality of pics. We are returning the camera and going to try the Sony Cypershot.

Reviews.Title: Not found as anticipated
Reviews.Author: SM
Reviews.Content: Review of the camera was very good. So, decided to buy it. Picture qualities were not as expected. Surprisingly my older canon powershot 650 IS produced better pic than this camera.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: deany "deany"
Reviews.Content: I like the camera.  Didn't know you need a card to store pictures. Many other cameras have enough internal memory to store pictures.  If you are not a camera buff it will take getting used to.  All cameras with features take getting used to.  I wanted a camera that has enough features (Optical zoom and megapixels) that I would not need to replace it the following year. I browsed through the manual the day before I was going to use it.  I was able to take pictures without being chained to the manual. Wish it came with a case.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Nancy Reeser "Don Reeser"
Reviews.Content: Canon SX200 This is a wonderful camera and it should be easy to learn to use it but the instruction booklet stinks. First it is too small and the print much smaller than makes for easy reading. The pictures of the LCDare so dark I have to use a magnifier to see what the icons are. I have 20-20 vision so I suspect I'm not alone with my thoughts. Come on Canon,you make a fine camera but spend a few more bucks and make the booklet easier to read, esp. for the novice trying to improve his photo skills.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the wait
Reviews.Author: ed
Reviews.Content: Had to return this camera after waiting over a month.After owning several Canon p/s that I was very pleased with and still own two, the sx200 is not at all what I expected. I have just returned it.The pop-up flash is just a really bad design for several reasons.The camera body has a very slippery feeling, and nothing really to anchor it in your hand with any feeling of safety from dropping.I fear it will be a real energy eater recharging batteries and replacing much to often.Bottom line, Canon has made a mistake with this camera.Guess I'll look at the Olympus 9000, or wait for the Panasonic tz7

Reviews.Title: NOT A POINT & SHOT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: J. Baez
Reviews.Content: It just doesn't take such hot pictures. My Canon PowerShot A610 took much better pictures. I'm more of a point & shot person so maybe it's me. But if you're like me a point & shot person don't buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: A shame
Reviews.Author: M. Lara
Reviews.Content: I don't really like this product!I find that is not comfortable the pop up flash.The lens retraction is really TOO slow the same as the shooter (easy to lost THE moments).The auto setting MANY times fails (really bad), you can't trust on it to take a good picture... Is better to use manual settings.The light capture is deficient the most of the times (it's a shame, maybe the worst).It was a big deception for me.Canon PowerShot SX200IS 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 12x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Red)

Reviews.Title: Disappointed ...sending back
Reviews.Author: M. Ghosh
Reviews.Content: Waited 2 months to get this camera. Got it today evening and took 50+ shots indoor and outdoor. Very bad quality indoor shots. Lots of noice and noice reduction distortion. Feels like $100 camera.I am going to return.
